TopicTitle: Challenge Excepted... Even Though No One Asked

Articles.Content: I saw this picture on the Imgur homepage, and immediately saw the landing legs. I've decided to try to make this in KSP, and land it on the Mun. Also, I'm surprised I saw something on the Imgur homepage that wasn't political, an unfunny meme, or a political unfunny meme.
So... You are gonna land a saturn 1 on the mun?
Yeah. I’ve already built it, and it has way to much delta v for the Mun. Why just stop there?

I'm nowhere near getting Kerbals to Jool yet. I've sent probes, but that's just about it.

Edited August 21, 2022 by Kerbalsaurus
